1.review: Very fun, if only I had friends to play with. Oh well, bots won't leave me for dead.

2.review: Left 4 Dead 2 is well-known classic. After playing this game since it was released, I have found myself coming back to it time after time again until now. It never gets old. Considered to be one of the best co-op games! I would recommend 10/10.

3.review: This game is great and really fun but I can't recommend it after latest update. While large number of people are complaining about majority of mods from workshop being broken, I am okay with playing without those. However there are number of issues that appeared as a result of this update. From frequent frame drops, people missing from HUD, missing sounds, broken achievements, addition of new weapons which were never tested with bots and are lacking balancing, etc. All of these issues are new and people are angry with a reason. We gained very little but lost so much.

4.review: Waited like 10 years for a update. Honestly, This update disappointed me. 2 rounds are now enough and the only thing I saw during play the new campaign map is the 'brand new' melee weapon, which is stupid and the stiff movements. Especially the shovel is the worst melee weapon I ever used in this game.

5.review: Still the best zombie game ever! Try it out, there are alots of workshop mods and they are absolutely cool. Recommended!

6.review: The new update is very disappointing for removing the single player campaign, please bring it back asap. Sometimes you just want to have fun and enjoy the game alone. The removal of this is a terrible call and makes me regret my purchase.

1.review: I was never a CS player. For years I used to play Call Of Duty games, especially the first Modern Warfare. After taking a break from Call Of Duty I started playing League of Legends and one simple day we got bored of it and out of a joke we downloaded CS 1.6 and found a random public server. One thing led to another, I became an admin, soon a head admin and then an owner of a server. In the meantime I met a person that means the world to me. The server shutdown in the meantime and I had a 3-year break from the game. Corona did what it did and I fell in love and opened a new public server. Despite many issues with being able to cheat any way you want this game actually brought me a lot of happiness which I never even thought it would when I started playing it 5-6 years ago.
